titleStmt.title: Second remarks upon An essay concerning humane understanding in a letter address'd to the author, being a vindication of the first remarks against the answer of Mr. Lock, at the end of his reply to the Lord Bishop of Worcester.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Thomas, 1635?-1715.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to T. Burnet. Cf. BM.
